Greetings to all,
I have just added an article entitled "Ura Nihon no Toko" by Yoshikawa Kentaro, to my website. Also, I have listed a fine koto Mihara katana that was worn by Colonel Goto in WWII. Please have a look if you are interested. Thank you

Best regards,
Danny Massey
www.nihontocraft.com
